AutoReplacement.Replacement: SELECT CONCAT(OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(SV.object_id), '.', SV.name) AS View_Nm, OBJECT_DEFINITION(SV.object_id) AS View_Definition, CC.Column_Count, SV.Create_Date, SV.Modify_Date FROM sys.views AS SV CROSS APPLY (SELECT MAX(column_id) AS Column_Count FROM sys.columns AS SC WHERE SV.object_id = SC.object_id) AS CC WHERE 1 = 1 --AND OBJECT_SCHEMA_NAME(SV.object_id) IN ('') --AND SV.name LIKE '%%' ORDER BY 1 ;
